name: docs-typescale
description: Typography scale and baseline grid system

scripts.generate: npm run generate:docs && npm run generate:editorial && npm run generate:apps
scripts.generate:docs: npx @lyubomir-popov/baseline-nudge-generator generate config/typography-config-docs.json src/docs && node scripts/update-plugin-tokens.js
scripts.generate:editorial: npx @lyubomir-popov/baseline-nudge-generator generate config/typography-config-editorial.json src/editorial && node scripts/update-plugin-tokens.js
scripts.generate:apps: npx @lyubomir-popov/baseline-nudge-generator generate config/typography-config-apps.json src/apps && node scripts/update-plugin-tokens.js
